definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: A partition surfaced in foil wall covering stands in lieu of a headboard.
sentences.chinese: 一面金属箔片饰面的隔墙替代了床头板原先的位置。

sentences.english: Theat the head of your bed has an automatic waking device.
sentences.chinese: 您床头的台子装有不佣人的劳力叫醒器。

sentences.english: There is a bolster across the head of the bed.
Position child with head of bed slightly elevated to decrease cerebral edema; monitor administration of fluids.
sentences.chinese: 卧床时，床头略微抬高，减少脑水肿，监视补液情况。

sentences.english: Your head is knocking the headboard and you feel it might blow off?
sentences.chinese: 你的头一直撞到床头板你感觉它快要炸开？

sentences.english: On it came-on, silently and stealthily, to the bed's head.
sentences.chinese: 它走上前来，无声无息偷偷摸摸地摸到了床头。

sentences.english: He is afraid of waking up late, so he always has an alarm on his bedside table.
sentences.chinese: 他怕睡过头，总是在床头小几上放一个闹钟。

sentences.english: Gerard tried the light on the nightstand, but it was out.
sentences.chinese: 杰拉德试图打开床头灯，但灯没亮。

sentences.english: She had a reading lamp in case she woke up in the night and was frightened.
sentences.chinese: 难以置信的是她有床头灯，以防她半夜醒来觉得害怕。

sentences.english: Chinese audiobooks including essays, poems and occasionally novels.
sentences.chinese: 床头书，散文诗歌偶尔小说。

sentences.english: Above the bed, there is a picture of Yao ming, my favorite basketball star.
sentences.chinese: 在床头上面有张我最喜欢的篮球明星姚明的图片。

sentences.english: All material prepare completely, the book also places the head.
sentences.chinese: 所有资料都准备齐全，书也放在床头。

sentences.english: Leave it on her bedside table when you head to work.
sentences.chinese: 摆在她的床头柜，好让她在你上班的时候也能看到你。

sentences.english: He placed the cage that used to belong to Hedwig atop the nightstand.
sentences.chinese: 他把那个曾经属于海德薇的笼子放在床头。

sentences.english: PE head and end , easy for installment.
sentences.chinese: PE床头床尾板，可轻松装卸。

sentences.english: He fumbled for the bedside lamp and turned it on.
sentences.chinese: 他伸手去摸床头灯，把灯打开。

definition: sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
